terminology.Creator: Users who earn money by providing companionship/entertainment
terminology.Coins: Virtual currency purchased by users to spend on the platform
terminology.Gems: Currency earned by creators that can be converted to real money
terminology.Live Room: Audio/video room where multiple users can interact
terminology.VIP: Premium subscription tier with enhanced features
terminology.Agency: Organization that manages multiple creators and takes commission
terminology.GMV: Gross Merchandise Value - total transaction volume
terminology.KYC: Know Your Customer - identity verification process

technical_context.realtime: Agora SDK for voice/video, Supabase Realtime for data
technical_context.automation: Direct implementation for MVP, n8n deferred to Phase 2

key_differentiators: Faster payout (T+1 vs T+3 to T+7)

notes: MVP scope: Phase 1 (0-6 months) targeting 50K users and ₹20L GMV
AI Companion: Deferred to Phase 2 - launch with human creators only
Agency Model: Required for MVP - need agency onboarding and commission tracking from day one
Live Voice Rooms: Included in MVP (upgraded from Phase 2)
Video Calls: Included in MVP (upgraded from Phase 2)
Chat: 1-to-1 messaging + room chat included in MVP
Automation: n8n deferred to Phase 2 - critical automations built directly
